strapiPost.title: Watch 16 Candles With John Cusack At Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
Movie star John Cusack will host an evening of conversation and a screening of the cult classic film 16 Candles at Walton Arts Center on Sunday, Oct 29, at 7p.

  • In your eyes: One of Hollywood's most accomplished and respected actors, Cusack has starred in over 70 films over four decades, gaining critical acclaim and prestigious accolades for his dramatic and comedic roles and will likely forever hold the title for most iconic scene ever filmed with a boombox.
  • Cult classic: 16 Candles was one of Cusack's earliest film appearances and has become a classic portrayal of teen angst and 80's culture. After the film, attendees are invited to join a live conversation with John Cusack about his career and the making of his movies. 

Tickets range from $70-$120 and will go on sale this Friday, May 19, at 10a HERE.
